resources.string: This app is designed to be your one stop shop for searching for web map services.\n\n Tap on VIEW ALL WMS OPTIONS to see what is currently available through the app.

1. Start by tapping the SEARCH FOR WMS button to view available sources.\n 2. Enter the ID number of the web map service you wish to view.\n 3. Tap on the OPEN WMS OVER MAP button to overlay the web map service over Google Maps.
